  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205372</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Bleeding Edge: Loren Chasse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Bluten-Rand: Loren Chasse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Bord de Saignement : Loren Chasse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Borda Do Sangramento: Loren Chasse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Bordo Di Spurgo: Loren Chasse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αιμορραγώντας άκρη: Loren Chasse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Borde De la Sangría: Loren Chasse</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Sound artist Loren Chasse seeks out unusual acoustic environments and teaches a class of students about fundamentals of sound. This Educator Guide explores sound and the history of sound as a musical form, extending back to the early 1900s.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stichhaltiger Künstler Loren Chasse sucht 
ungewöhnliche akustische Umgebungen aus und unterrichtet eine 
Kategorie Kursteilnehmer über Grundlagen des Tones. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung erforscht Ton und die Geschichte des Tones als 
musikalisches Formular und dehnt sich zurück zu den frühen 1900s 
aus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'artiste sain Loren Chasse cherche les 
environnements acoustiques peu communs et enseigne une classe 
d'étudiants au sujet des principes fondamentaux de bruit. Ce 
guide d'éducateur explore le bruit et l'histoire du bruit comme forme
musicale, étendant de nouveau aux années 1900 tôt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O artista sadio Loren Chasse procura para fora 
ambientes acústicos incomuns e ensina uma classe dos estudantes sobre
fundamentos do som. Esta guia do educador explora o som e o 
history do som como um formulário musical, estendendo para trás aos 
1900s adiantados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'artista sano Loren Chasse cerca gli ambienti 
acustici insoliti ed insegna un codice categoria degli allievi circa i
fondamenti del suono. Questa guida dell'educatore esplora il 
suono e la storia del suono come forma musicale, estendentesi di nuovo
ai 1900s in anticipo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο υγιής καλλιτέχνης Loren Chasse αναζητά τα 
ασυνήθιστα ακουστικά περιβάλλοντα και διδάσκει μια κλάση των 
σπουδαστών για τις βασικές αρχές του ήχου. Αυτός ο οδηγός 
εκπαιδευτικών ερευνά τον ήχο και την ιστορία του ήχου ως μουσική
μορφή, που επεκτείνεται πίσω στις πρόωρες δεκαετίες του 20ου 
αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El artista sano Loren Chasse busca ambientes 
acústicos inusuales y enseña a clase de estudiantes sobre 
fundamentales del sonido. Esta guía del educador explora el 
sonido y la historia del sonido como forma musical, extendiendo de 
nuevo a los 1900s tempranos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
